comment: Exactly days between doses.I felt like I was hit by a bus! Chills, aching joints, fatigue for days. Back to myself now and it's worth it.
amr:
# ::snt Exactly days between doses.I felt like I was hit by a bus! Chills, aching joints, fatigue for days. Back to myself now and it's worth it.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / feel-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (h / hit-01
                  :ARG0 (b / bus)
                  :ARG1 ii)
            :mod (e / exact)
            :duration (m2 / multiple
                  :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (d / day))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (c / chill-01)
            :op2 (j / joint
                  :ARG1-of (a2 / ache-01))
            :op3 (f2 / fatigue-01)
            :duration (m3 / multiple
                  :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (d2 / day))))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op1 (b2 / back-02
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / i)
                  :time (n / now))
            :op2 (w / worth-02
                  :ARG1 (ii3 / it))))
